divs: Sighting Detailswe were on the way to work the sky was clear blue only one small cloud in the sky as we topped a hill i looked above the cloud and saw 4 objects obove the cloud 2 big and 2 smaller no movement just hovering i told the guys in the truck to look at this and about that time 3 disapeared in a matter of a second the last one slowly moved away and got smaller and smaller till it was out of sight then 3 reappeared in a second under the cloud one large craft was far left of the cloud on a 45 degree angle and the other 2 smaller were under the cloud then in a few seconds they were gone total est. time 1and half minutes or 2
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
Summary: 4 craft above single cloud 3 disapeared in a second one dissapeared slowly .3 reapeared under cloud one on 45 degree angle
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in poteau
There were no other sightings in poteau on or around January 15th 2012
